name: simbl
description: Lightweight companion for SIMBL CLI backlog manager - task hygiene, quick capture, and reduced context-switching during coding sessions

agents.name: task-agent
agents.description: Task hygiene companion for SIMBL. Use PROACTIVELY after completing code changes, when encountering bugs not in backlog, or when backlog needs cleanup.

commands.name: simbl-start
commands.description: Begin working on a SIMBL task - marks it in-progress and displays context

commands.name: simbl-add
commands.description: Quick-capture a new task with auto-priority detection from keywords

commands.name: simbl-brief
commands.description: Show project snapshot - recent completions, in-progress work, and what's next

skills.name: cli-guide
skills.description: SIMBL CLI command reference and usage guide

skills.name: effective-tasks
skills.description: Best practices for writing SIMBL tasks that Claude can execute with zero context
